articles.title: Facebook buys GIF website Giphy to integrate with Instagram - iTnews
articles.description: Popular website for making and sharing animated images.
articles.content:
Facebook Inc is acquiring Giphy, a popular website for making and sharing animated images, or GIFs, Facebook said in a blog post on Friday.
